variations.template: You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each."
rts: You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each."

variations.template: You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each."
rts: You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each."
